item.title: Promethium [725/728] Moneypouch (matrix based) (new links)
item.dc:creator: @nick704 nick704
item.description:
@nick704 wrote:

[quote=“goudont, post:81, topic:455987”]Guys…

#1. You’ll have to delete your mapdata, if that doesn’t work or if it is already done, re-add it, and compile, Then run the source.
#2. To make your self owner, you’ll have to replace (in commands.java) all “drop_flight” with “WHATEVER_YOURNAME_IS” (it may also be in player.java, about line 345.
#3. Download the cache from the original matrix source, or this link:
http://uppit.com/67l6hnmfrlva/718-728MatrixCache.rar
#4. PLEASE STOP POSTING QUESTIONS IN THE THREAD. PM THE USER ABOUT IT! Bumping threads just for basic questions… I really think the replies to threads should only be criticism, respectful comments, or w/e.

Thank you. Happy leeching!

Anyways, really good job, but the tutorials were posted for people to follow if they used their brain to search them up -.- . I look forward to seeing more work from you.[/quote]

idk if im going to but i may release my v2 , including 100% sof

Read full topic

item.title: Promethium [725/728] Moneypouch (matrix based) (new links)
item.dc:creator: @goudont goudont
item.description:
@goudont wrote:

Guys…

#1. You’ll have to delete your mapdata, if that doesn’t work or if it is already done, re-add it, and compile, Then run the source.
#2. To make your self owner, you’ll have to replace (in commands.java) all “drop_flight” with “WHATEVER_YOURNAME_IS” (it may also be in player.java, about line 345.
#3. Download the cache from the original matrix source, or this link:
http://uppit.com/67l6hnmfrlva/718-728MatrixCache.rar
#4. PLEASE STOP POSTING QUESTIONS IN THE THREAD. PM THE USER ABOUT IT! Bumping threads just for basic questions… I really think the replies to threads should only be criticism, respectful comments, or w/e.

Thank you. Happy leeching!

Anyways, really good job, but the tutorials were posted for people to follow if they used their brain to search them up -.- . I look forward to seeing more work from you.

Read full topic
